verses.content: Jeroboam inlal kum sâwm- parietnaa chun Abija chun Juda rama chun ro a rêl ṭan a.
Ama chun kum thum lai Jerusalemah ro a rêl a; a nu hming chu Mikaia, Gibea mi, Uriel naunu kha a nih. Chun, Jeroboam le Abija inkâra khawm chun indona a um a.

Abija chun indonaa mi hrât ruol sipai pâwl thlang ṭhieu nuoi li lai chun indonaa chun a hang thaw a; Jeroboam khawm chun mi hrât khawkhêng thlang ṭhieu nuoi riet leh indonaa chun ama chu a hung ep ve bawk a.
Abija chu Ephraim tlâng rama Zemaraim tlâng chunga chun a ngîr a. “Aw Jeroboam le Israel mi po pohai, mi lo ngai ta u;
LALPA Israelhai Pathienin David le a thlahai kuomah Israel ram chu kumkhuoa dingin machi thuthlung hmangin a pêk a nih, ti in hriet naw am a ni?
David naupa Solomon siehlaw, Nebat naupa Jeroboam hi thoin, a pu chungah a lo hel el hi.

Chun, ama kuoma chun mi teplohai, mi hmangna bohai chu an inkhâwm a, Rehoboam chu a la nau- panga, lungril dâwng a ni lai khan, anni chu Solomon naupa Rehoboam kalin an insukhrât a, ama chun a lo dang zo ta naw kha a na.
Chun, tuhin David naupasalhai kuta LALPA ram chu do thei dingin in inngaituoh a, mipui nasatak in na, in kuoma chun in pathienhai dinga Jeroboamin a siem rângkachak bâwngtehai chu an um bawk a.

LALPA thiempuhai Aron nau- pasalhai le Levi mihai chu in hnawtsuokin, ram dang mihai dân angin thiempuhai in insiem fâwm a ni naw am a nih? chuleichun, mi tukhawm berâm pasari le bâwngchal tuoia ama inpumpêk dinga hung taphawt chu pathien ni lohai thiempuhai chu an ni thei pei a.
Amiruokchu, keini chu LALPA chu kan Pathien a na, ama chu kan nghatsan nawh a; LALPA ta dinga rawngbâwltu thiempu kan neihai chu Aron naupasalhai an na, Levi chihaiin an ṭhangpui a;

riminhnik thilinhlânhai le pum- rawhmang thilinhlânhai chu zîng tin le zân tin LALPA kuoma chun an rawh a; entirna bei khawm chu dawkân inthieng chunga chun indawt thliein an sieh a; chun, rângkachak sathâu khâwnvar siena khawm, chutaka a khâwnvarhai zân tina sit ding leh; LALPA kan Pathien thupêk ang chu kan kawl zing a; amiruokchu, nangni chun in nghatsan a ni hi.

Chun, en ta u, Pathien chu kan hma tieng keini lai a um a; in chunga inlâuna sukri dingin suklauna taw- tawrâwthai le thiempuhai chu an um bawk a; Aw Israel thlahai, in thla- tuhai Pathien LALPA chu do naw ro khai; in hlawtling naw ding a ni sih a,” tiin.
Nisienlakhawm, Jeroboam chun an hnung tienga hung dingin lambun pâwl a siem a; chuongchun, Juda hmaa chun an um a, lambun pâwl chu an hnunga chun an um bawk a.
Chun, Juda mihai chu an hei nghakîr chun, ngai ta, râl chu an hma le hnunga chun an um tah a; LALPA chu an ko a, thiempuhai chun taw- tawrâwthai chu an mût tah a.
Chun, Juda mihai chu an khêk a; chuonga Juda mihai an khêk chun, Pathienin Israelhai po po le Jeroboam chu Abija le Juda mihai hmaa chun a hung suktlâwm tah a.
Chuongchun, Juda mihai hmaa inthawk chun Israel mihai chu an tlânseh a; chun, Pathienin an kuta chun anni chu a pêk tah a.
Abija le a mihai chun nasatakin anni chu an that tah a, chuongchun, thlang ṭhieu Israel mi nuoi nga chu thatin an tlu tah a.
Chuongchun, chu huna chun Israel thlahai chu sukhnuoiin an um tah a, Juda thlahai ruok chun an thlatuhai Pathien LALPA chu an ringsan leiin an hne tah a.
Abija chun Jeroboam chu a hnawt pei a, amaa inthawk chun khawpuihai a lâk a; Bethel le chutaka a khawperhai leh, Jesana le chutaka a khawperhai leh, Ephron le chutaka a khawperhai leh.
Abija dam sûng chun Jeroboam chu a hrât suok nâwk ta ngai nawh a; LALPA chun a hrem a, ama chu a thi tah a.
Chun, Abija chun thil a hung thawthei deu deu a, nuhmei sâwm pali a nei a, naupasal sâwmhni pahni le naunuhmei sâwmparuk a nei a.
Abija thilthaw danghai, a thaw- dânhai le a thuhrilhai chu zâwl- nei Iddo hrilfiena bua chun ziek an nih.
